abilityEffect.en: When you play Entei from your hand, you may discard the top 5 cards of your deck. (If you have fewer cards in your deck than that, discard all of them.) If any of those are [R] Energy cards, attach them to any of your [R] Pok√©mon of your choice. Using this power ends your turn.

effect.en: Discard 2 [R] Energy cards attached to Entei or this attack does nothing.
